name: BNNSLayerParametersBroadcastMatMul
desc: A structure that contains the parameters of a broadcast matrix multiply layer.

items.name: init(alpha: Float, beta: Float, transA: Bool, transB: Bool, quadratic: Bool, a_is_weights: Bool, b_is_weights: Bool, iA_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, iB_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, o_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor)
items.desc: Returns a new broadcast matrix multiply layer parameters structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new broadcast matrix multiply layer parameters structure.

items.name: var alpha: Float
items.desc: A value to scale the result.

items.name: var beta: Float
items.desc: A value, that must be either 0.0 or 1.0, you use to scale the existing output before the operation adds it to the result.

items.name: var transA: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that transposes the last two dimensions of matrix A.

items.name: var transB: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that transposes the last two dimensions of matrix B.

items.name: var quadratic: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the operation multiplies matrix A by itself.

items.name: var a_is_weights: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether to treat matrix A as weights.

items.name: var b_is_weights: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether to treat matrix B as weights.
